alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 13 at 2:47PM MDT until June 16 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River At La Junta affecting La Junta Vicinity/Otero County zone. For the Lower Arkansas River...including La Junta...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Arkansas River At La Junta. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Minor Flood. Minor agricultural flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM MDT Tuesday the stage was 8.3 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
